attributes.action: Out of the EU And its Meddling
attributes.additional_details:
I hereby  demand action on the removal of Britan from the EU On the grounds we are perfectly able to Goven  with out the constant interference of a foreign community undermining the laws of our country/
We  in the uk have paid enough  out of our Taxs and demand that  Mr Cameron and Co  do what they promisd before they were elected . Actions speak Louder than words, Get us out now.
